reasoning: The query "Infectobesity: Adenovirus 36 and Childhood Obesity" suggests a user interested in understanding the potential link between viral infection (Ad-36) and childhood obesity. The search aims to uncover scientific research exploring this correlation, its mechanisms, and potential implications.  However, existing results primarily focus on Ad-36, leaving room for broader exploration of other viruses and obesity factors.
query_goals: Understand the relationship between adenovirus 36 and childhood obesity
Explore potential mechanisms linking viral infection to weight gain
Identify research on other viruses potentially contributing to obesity
Investigate limitations of current research on Ad-36 and obesity
augmented_query: "Adenovirus 36 AND Childhood Obesity AND  Viruses AND obesity mechanisms AND gastrointestinal infections"
